originalText.text: We had the pleasure of working with Sergey and Lana in selling our property. Although it was not the smoothest closing, Sergey was super helpful in providing us with information we needed in order to make well informed decisions to get to the finish line.  He was always calm, listening to our questions, answering our calls/emails/texts in a timely manner as well as in a way that was clear and concise for both us to understand and very professional. He put us at ease with his expertise and knowledge. Sergey and Lana were wonderful to work with. We recommend their services!

originalText.text: My husband and I have used Sergey twice now, for both buying and selling purposes. Sergey is wonderful, he is fully involved, quick to respond and highly attentive every step of the way. He explains things in a clear manner when needed and is very patient and kind. Highly recommend!

text.text: My husband and I have used Sergey twice now, for both buying and selling purposes. Sergey is wonderful, he is fully involved, quick to respond and highly attentive every step of the way. He explains things in a clear manner when needed and is very patient and kind. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: We used Mekhtiyev Law Firm when we purchased our townhouse in Brooklyn. We dealt primarily with Zulfiya, and she represented us at our closing, but the other staff at Mekhtiyev were all wonderful when we spoke to others as well. Zulfiya was accessible via email and phone -- she always answered or responded quickly, and answered all of our many questions patiently. She was thorough and made sure nothing slipped through the cracks, up to and at the closing. I'd recommend working with Mekhtiyev Law Firm 1000%.

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience with Sergey while working through two home closings concurrently. He was extremely accessible, knowledgeable, and patient while answering all of my questions. He guided me through the entire process from beginning to end. I highly recommend his services!

text.text: I had an amazing experience with Sergey while working through two home closings concurrently. He was extremely accessible, knowledgeable, and patient while answering all of my questions. He guided me through the entire process from beginning to end. I highly recommend his services!

originalText.text: Serge is my go to Atty! We have done over 5 deals together and is always on point. He is patient and answers all questions. He is highly regarded as one of the best Real Estate Attorneys in NYC from the community. Don’t hesitate to work with him and his team.
